alert.note: Alert for West Polk (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 11:16PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Polk and east central Grand Forks Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1116 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Grand Forks, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Grand Forks, East Grand Forks, Fisher, Merrifield, Mallory, Bygland and Davidson. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 131 and 146. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
